resources.string: Please enter your name.\nIt will be used to identify which robot is yours.
Enable Bluetooth to get faster scanning and WiFi management features.
Unfortunately, RBControl can\'t use your device\'s WiFi configurations due to Android\'s security measures.\n\nInstead, RBControl will keep WiFi configurations for your robot stored here.
bluetooth connection could not be established
device doesn\'t have the required GATT service
devices doen\'t have the requried GATT characteristic
This robot and your device is on the same WiFi, but RBControl can\'t determine its IP. Try rescanning the network.
Failed to add new WiFi network.
Failed to switch to the Robot\'s WiFi network.
Timed out when trying to connect to robot\'s WiFi.
Too many WiFi changes in a short time, please connect to the network manually.
Can\'t configure WiFi on this robot because it was not found using Bluetooth.

This version of RBControl supports using Bluetooth to find robots and configure them.

In order to use Bluetooth on Android, RBControl must request the permission to access location.

If you wish to use the Bluetooth-related features, please allow RBControl to use this permission in the next step.

The robot\'s software also requires an update in order to support these Bluetooth features.
